Shopping & Spas in Park City

Luxury Shopping, World-Class Spas, and Ultimate Relaxation in the Mountains

Historic Main Street Shopping

Park City's historic Main Street offers world-class shopping and spa experiences in a stunning mountain setting. From luxury boutiques and unique local shops to internationally acclaimed spas, you'll find everything you need for retail therapy and ultimate relaxation.

Independent bookstore with carefully curated selection, local authors, and cozy reading nooks. Perfect for book lovers.

  • Coffee and treats
  • Unique gifts
  • Location: 510 Main St

Boutique women's clothing with carefully selected contemporary and designer pieces. Focus on quality and style.

Outdoor gear and mountain lifestyle clothing. Everything for your Park City adventure from skiing to hiking.

Shopping & Spa Tips

Shopping Tips

  • Many shops offer local discounts - ask about them
  • Free parking is available but can be limited on Main Street
  • Shop early in the day to avoid crowds
  • Many stores offer shipping services
  • Check for seasonal sales and clearance events

Spa Tips

  • Book treatments well in advance, especially in peak season
  • Arrive 30 minutes early to enjoy facilities
  • Ask about package deals for multiple treatments
  • Consider the altitude when booking treatments
  • Many spas offer group packages for special events
